Articles.Content:
This is a big but good truck that i like and made

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605557947/1016F1B52F6E767A3DCC9F8830131536A150E537/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

This is the base version with no addons and just the basics

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605558104/05B18D53C1F1CA12AD39E87872A02A6D389D9BDA/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

It also has a detachable back and a hollow interior and can seat many kerbals or some cargo

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605558324/345597CAE9E9FBE9CF420B28483068C73289E569/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

The other version is one with a tow hitch on the back that can attack to the trailer(I know the hitch is quite bulky but that is the smallest i could make it.) 

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605558434/417319E6C6061221288EF52C39C2AA974290F060/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

You can drive around with it on perfectly fine but be careful on ramps/hills and on turns.

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605558592/00CFD9C9A4BC02C1A4EA70DC480F09F789879E0E/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

And all the side panels of the trailer can come off, It can some times be really hard to get them all of but its possible. Now you can stuff what ever you want in there, like bd Armory guns or little rovers.

![?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|1024:575&composite-to=*,*|1024:575&background-color=black](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/520511262605558720/262746D66E10DCCBBEF425D0613CA1920404CFDB/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside%7C1024:575&composite-to=*,*%7C1024:575&background-color=black)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-17T02:01:42Z" title="06/17/2015 02:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 17, 2015</time> by Mr.Mania**
